function47

Zhaoyang Han

I am Zhaoyang Han, a PhD candidate at Northeastern University advised by Prof. Miriam Leeser. I received my Bachelor's degree at University of Manchester and Master's degree at University of Pennsylvania. I mainly focus on reconfigurable hardwares and networking systems.

Contact: zhhan at(symbol) dot coe dot neu dot edu

Nik Sultana, John Sonchack, Hans Giesen, Isaac Pedisich, Zhaoyang Han, Nishanth Shyamkumar, Shivani Burad, André DeHon, Boon Thau Loo

Reducing FPGA compile time with separate compilation for FPGA building blocks

Yuanlong Xiao, Dongjoon Park, Andrew Butt, Hans Giesen, Zhaoyang Han, Rui Ding, Nevo Magnezi, Raphael Rubin, André DeHon
